raw_text:
Apple
Localisation QA Engineer, Turkish
Cork, Ireland
Perform manual localisation testing on software, print documents, help and hardware while identifying linguistic and international functionality issues. Report issues found, provide pertinent information and follow solutions to their conclusion. Identify areas of improvement in existing tools and processes and address those issues with innovative solutions. Work cross-functionally with international software quality centers, engineering teams, translators and project managers in an effort to ensure delivery of world-class products to our international customers. Successful candidates will be proactive, able to work independently and collaborate with a large amount of stakeholders on numerous concurrent projects.
Minimum Qualifications
Fluent in Turkish
Deep knowledge of linguistics.
Experience in software localisation.
Expert in troubleshooting and problem isolation.
Preferred Qualifications
Enthusiasm for user-focused design, high-quality technology and products.
Proficient user of the Terminal or command-line interface is desirable.
Test automation or software development experience is also desirable.
The ideal candidate will enjoy breaking our software in order to improve it
